challenges.title: Middle of Linked List
challenges.description: Print the middle element using two-pointer (slow/fast) technique. If even number of nodes, print the second middle.

challenges.title: Detect Loop (Cycle Detection)
challenges.description: Given Linked List and integer P that tells where last node connects (P = -1 means no loop). Detect if cycle exists using Floyd's cycle algorithm and print Yes or No.
challenges.inputNote: Last input (P) is index of node to connect last node to (0-indexed).
